channel.title: Playing Runescape Agian
channel.description: Well since my computer was really shit and The updates kept making it laggy i stopped playing Runescape but just today i went and bought myself a new computer for a $899, Which is pretty expensive here. So i will start to play Runescape agian and i am not famaliar with all the new updates and stuff. Would like some opinion on what are some of the fun things to do in RS. Well just thought if sharing this with you guys, i dont mind if you don't care.

item.title: Playing Runescape Agian
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

ollie123:

I get that reference I absolutely love that series

I just found out last month they still make them, so I rewatched every episode.

Read full topic

item.title: Playing Runescape Agian
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:4, topic:407951”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=509238.msg3694451#msg3694451 date=1312337159]

Nice story.

Would like some opinion on what are some of the fun things to do in RS

This should be the basis of your topic. Change the title and the context or it’ll probably get locked.

For what? He just wants to know what to do on a boring bot infested game.

Fun things… Pking, skilling… then playing call of duty. Repeat for the rest of your life.
[/quote]

Cock on duty modern gay fuck stupid sucks. Halo r wey betar. (Arby n the chief reference. But I doubt anyone will get it.)

@OP: I like pking. That’s fun.[/quote]

I get that reference I absolutely love that series

Read full topic

item.title: Playing Runescape Agian
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:5, topic:407951”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=509238.msg3694458#msg3694458 date=1312337401]

Nice story.

Would like some opinion on what are some of the fun things to do in RS

This should be the basis of your topic. Change the title and the context or it’ll probably get locked.

For what? He just wants to know what to do on a boring bot infested game.

Fun things… Pking, skilling… then playing call of duty. Repeat for the rest of your life.

Cock on duty modern gay fuck stupid sucks. Halo r wey betar. (Arby n the chief reference. But I doubt anyone will get it.)

@OP: I like pking. That’s fun.
[/quote]

But I don’t have modern warfare D: … My disk scratched and to fix it I have to go to gamestop :L[/quote]

I played modern warfare for a few months. But that’s only because everyone stopped playing Halo. Then I got so pissed at call of duty, from hackers and such, I went back to halo. Then Black Ops came out and I thought I would give it a shot, but it’s absolute shit. (And when I say Halo. I mean Halo 3. Reach is almost as bad as Black Ops.)

Read full topic
